name: BLOPCK
description:
BLOPCK is a game about collecting trash gems in a dystopian future. Among the ruins of our modern civilization, armor clad warriors compete for honor, glory, and to see who can collect the most garbage before the time runs out.

This is a terrible game and is the first game I ever made. When I started I had absolutely zero programming knowledge. I didn't know my ass from a hole in the ground about making a game. Somehow, through no small amount of self harm, I completed it.

Art by Ray Chen
